name: 48LawsofPower
0:
”Alexa, ask Forty-Eight Laws of Power to give me a law”
”Alexa, ask Forty-Eight Laws of Power to quote one of the laws”
”Alexa, ask Forty-Eight Laws of Power to tell me something”

des: This skill simply choses a random law of power and provides a short summary of the law
